prompt: Create a simple RC-style car chassis as a parametric model: a 180 mm x 80 mm x 3 mm base plate, 4 wheel holes (diameter 6 mm) located 15 mm from each corner, and 4 wheel cylinders (radius 20 mm, thickness 8 mm) centered on those holes but as separate NEW bodies. Then add 2 longitudinal ribs: 160 mm x 6 mm x 12 mm, located at y=+20 mm and y=-20 mm, merged (ADD) to the base. Use separate sketches where needed and explicit units. Validate with onshape_snapshot_partstudio.
